verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa-sāmye nahe tāṅra mādhuryāsvādana
bhakta-bhāve kare tāṅra mādhurya carvaṇa

synonyms: kṛṣṇa-sāmye—on an equal level with Kṛṣṇa; nahe—not; tāṅra—His; mādhurya-āsvādana—relishing the sweetness; bhakta-bhāve—as a devotee; kare—does; tāṅra—His; mādhurya carvaṇa—chewing of the sweetness.
translation: The sweetness of Lord Kṛṣṇa is not to be tasted by those who consider themselves equal to Kṛṣṇa. It is to be tasted only through the sentiment of servitude.
